name: Elevator Survival
description: Control an Eldritch beast in this horror-themed spin-off of Taito's '83 title, Elevator Action. Use your agility and guile to collect the eggs in the evil scientists' lab. Twitch chat integration allows Twitch Viewers to participate in the action by spawning enemies! How long can you collect your eggs, and avoid the soldiers, eldritch dogs, and traps?
